description: The image depicts a kitchen scene. On the left, there is a black microwave oven with a label on its door. To the right of the microwave, there is a brown bottle with a label. In the foreground, there is a red bowl with a green spoon inside it. The bowl is located in the center of the image, and the spoon is inside the bowl. The sink is visible
